Projects.name: Smart Irrigation System
Projects.description:
INTEGRATED INTELLIGENT AGRICULTURE SYSTEM
Internet of Things
TIDE 2.0 Winner, MeitY, Govt. of India
Recently recognized and appreciated by ICAR, Govt. of India
Lead the team of 4 software developers
Developed Smart sensor for capturing multi-level soil moisture
Augmented it with cloud Developed Web and mobile application for interface
